extendedInfo.description: Ofertas de LIDL.AplicaciÃ³n no oficial, esta aplicaciÃ³n trata de representar comodamente las ofertas de LIDL uk,  es simplemente una beta, con lo que se agradece cualquier comentario dirigido a los avances y mejoras de la aplicaciÃ³n, tened en cuenta que es una aplicaciÃ³n gratuita.Actualmente se esta trabajando en la velocidad de carga y que muestre la fecha de la oferta(resuelto version 0.02), sera bienvenida cualquier idea de agregar mas comercios como aldi, dia, etc....Se agradece vuestra puntuaciÃ³n y se intentaran tener en cuenta los consejos de los usuarios.Podeis dirigir vuestros comentarios a carmhesos@gmail.com

reviews.title: Worthless piece of rubbish
reviews.comment: Just an unordered continuous list of products with a thumbnail. No menu, no options, no click throughs, no anything really. Certainly doesn\'t endear me to Lidls, or help me shop on-line - which is how I have to shop. No stars; uninstalled.
reviews.author: Jon Brody

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: This app seems only 2 show all offers that you can\'t eat, like books, gardening bulbs, clothes n tool\'s which r not much good 2 me, hence only 1 star
reviews.author: bob taylor

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: More detail required Also date of offer Now please  include food items
reviews.author: bob stanton

reviews.title: Shite uninstalling
reviews.comment: No menus, can\'t access a single product, the pictures are so small even a telescope can\'t figure them out, don\'t waste your time on this app until they make it an official one.
reviews.author: tommy davis

reviews.title: Ok for a starter
reviews.comment: Being fair, this is better than nothing. We all have to start somewhere. If the improvements come quick enough, what is there to moan about?
reviews.author: Brian Rowe

reviews.title: Good beginnings
reviews.comment: Great for starters considering Lidl cannot be bothered to create an official app.  What would be useful is a storefinder.  Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: David Tucker

reviews.title: Needs work so lets make suggestions
reviews.comment: Although it\'s mildly fun seeing a thumbnailed list of non-food items currently available in your local store, I am more likely to want passata than an epilator.  What it needs: 1. food items 2. a way to add items to a virtual shopping list (press and hold is a good method) 3. something that tots up the price of your shopping list. 4. The completed shopping list itself needs to be available offline so you use it in your local store without signing in to mobile data. 5. you need to be able to search for products. To simplify this, rather than having to type things, there could be a list of categories eg  vegetables, tinned; fruit, fresh; yoghurt, instant noodles, which then gives you a list of the items available in that category.  A luxury extra (worth paying for this) would be finding out if an item is available in your local shop. The Paid For version could also include a (working) barcode scanner - something I have yet to find! The developer makes it clear that the app is still being developed so rather than just saying It\'s rubbish in our reviews, we have the chance to influence the finished product by saying what features would be useful to us.
reviews.author: evelyn woolston
